name: I Hate Mondays (Lenat_1, Tihan, 3DI70R, OrangeOwa)
description:
A journey through multiple genres and artstyles to experience the worst day a person can have.


Jim is a gamedeveloper, who works at a company creating games, and one day he loses the track of time, which leads into a sequence of events he'd probably rather not have. 

The game spans several genres, such as Point and Click, Horror, JRPG and more!

Controls:
WASD - movement
Left Mouse Button - interact
